title: doc: race_detector.html has disappeared
body:
http://golang.org/doc/articles/race_detector.html has disappeared.
Race detector link from documentation section now leads to the blog post, which does not
completely replace the manual (the blog does not cover flags, slowdown and other boring
aspects).
The blog now contains self-link in: "We're happy to announce that Go 1.1 includes a
__race detector__", which previously lead to the manual.
Please restore the manual.
